job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongEmployment Type strongFulltimeppbrppstrongLocationstrong This opportunity will require once a month travel to Pennsylvania or Alabama As you build your relationship with the team you may be allowed to work completely remoteppbrppstrongUnfortunately at this time my client can not transfer or sponsor visasstrongppbrppIm currently working with an extremely exciting organization who are a leading distributor and producer of mining and metals materials These materials are critical aspects used within the aerospace energy markets transportation medical and defense and other sectors They have been in business for over 200 years through financial and world health crises and continue to thrive Their diverse market portfolio allows all their employees to work in interesting spaces and learn about several industries that help power our worldppbrppThey are looking for Senior Data Scientist to produce machine learning solutions to help enhance the companys digital transformationppbrppuResponsibilitiesuppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspApply data science techniques to massive structured  unstructured data setsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDesign and develop statistical amp ML modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDesign and conduct experiment for observational data to identify the factors associated with poor quality and process variabilityppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDevelop anomaly detection modelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCommunicate and democratize model findings very clearly and precisely with stakeholdersppuRequirementsuppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMSPhD in quantitative field ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp4 years of experience in data scienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProficiency programming in Python or RppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFamiliarity with cloudbased solutions eg Azure AWS EMRppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong practical knowledge of ML and statistics techniquesppbrppstrongIf you are interested please send me your resume multiple time windows to speak email and phone number so I can book in it on our calendars Additionally referrals are appreciatedstrongp
